mapper.select: SELECT question_no, question_sender, question_recipient, member_name, member_id, question_date, question_read, question_content FROM questionview WHERE question_recipient=(SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id}) GROUP BY question_sender

SELECT question_no, question_sender, member_name, member_id, question_recipient, question_date, question_content, question_read, COUNT (*) as question_count FROM questionview WHERE question_sender=#{openmsg} AND question_recipient=(SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id})

SELECT question_no, question_sender, member_name, member_id, question_recipient, question_date, question_content, question_read FROM questionview WHERE question_sender=#{openmsg} AND question_recipient=(SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET question_read=1 WHERE question_no=#{openmsg} AND question_recipient=(SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_no=#{sendmsg }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM question WHERE question_no=#{no} AND question_recipient=(SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id})
